fr.cnrs.iees.graph

Class EdgeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cnrs.iees.graph.GraphElementAdapter
      • fr.cnrs.iees.graph.EdgeAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Edge, GraphElement, Identifiable, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Textable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleEdgeImpl

    public abstract class EdgeAdapter
extends GraphElementAdapter
implements Edge
    A base implementation of Edge with all the methods that should be universal in descendants
    Author:
    gignoux - 16 ao√ªt 2017

      • traversal

        public final java.util.Collection<Node> traversal(int distance)
        Description copied from interface: GraphElement
        As traversal(), but stopping after distance recursion steps. For example, node.traversal(1) will return only node, while node.traversal(2) will return all the Nodes connected with only 1 edge to this one.
        Specified by:
        traversal in interface GraphElement
        Parameters:
        distance - the number of recursion steps to search
        Returns:
        the connected Graph containing this instance
